overview: Come and enjoy the legendary scenes of our most beautiful actresses in this exceptional package offering more than 4 hours of pure enjoyment. Deciding to give free rein to their wildest fantasies, these young women with sublime bodies will deliver their best performances under the expert gaze of the cameras of Marc Dorcel's productions. Whether it's wearing the uniform of the famous "Russian Institute", offering themselves for one of the first time to several men or trying the most unspoken practices, our lolitas will give themselves with no limit to reach orgasm... To share it with us!
title: Lolitas Anthology
